branchCategory.name: AFF
branchCategory.description: <p>Main line filter series 90-AFF is mounted to main piping to remove impurities like oil, water and foreign matter in compressed air.&nbsp;90-AFF is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. No screw threads or tie rods are required; therefore, removal and replacement of the element is made quick and easy.&nbsp; Series AFF improves the function of downward dryers, extends the life of precision filters and prevents trouble with equipment.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-AFF2C-22C/AFF37B-75B, Main Line Filter, New Style
branchItem.description: <p>Main line filter series 90-AFF is mounted to main piping to remove impurities like oil, water and foreign matter in compressed air.&nbsp;90-AFF is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. No screw threads or tie rods are required; therefore, removal and replacement of the element is made quick and easy.&nbsp; Series AFF improves the function of downward dryers, extends the life of precision filters and prevents trouble with equipment.</p>
